feature.label: PlatformKit Jena Adapter
feature.description:
PlatformKit adapter for the Jena framework.
Jena is a Java framework for building Semantic Web applications. It provides a programmatic environment for RDF, RDFS and OWL, including a rule-based inference engine.
Jena is open source and grown out of work with the HP Labs Semantic Web Programme.
The Jena Framework includes:
* A RDF API * Reading and writing RDF in RDF/XML, N3 and N-Triples * An OWL API * In-memory and persistent storage * RDQL – a query language for RDF
